publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7048 Tricia Marwick: Congratulations to Glenrothes Heritage Centre—That the Parliament welcomes the pilot Glenrothes Heritage Centre, which celebrates the history of the Glenrothes area; considers that the unstinting work of the volunteers, particularly the chairperson, Linda Ballingall, has made it a reality and congratulates them; thanks the businesses for support in kind and Fife Council for financial assistance through Celebrating Fife 2010; notes that 7,500 people have visited the heritage centre in a two-week period, and believes that a permanent heritage centre in Glenrothes is now needed. Supported by: Nanette Milne*, Aileen Campbell*, Elizabeth Smith*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Claire Baker*, Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-7048 Congratulations to Glenrothes Heritage Centre (lodged on 22 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*
